welcome_message_body: Welcome to Chinandega, Nicaragua! Get ready to experience the charm of this vibrant city known for its beautiful beaches, rich history, and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Chinandega has to offer.

restaurants.name: Subway
restaurants.description: Subway is a sandwich spot located in Chinandega.
restaurants.address: Esquina de Los Bancos 20 Metros Al Oeste, 505, Chinandega, Chinandega
